title: Livelihood-Enhancement-Program
details: At KCCBSSA, we recognize that sustainable livelihoods are essential for overcoming socio-economic challenges such as poor health, food insecurity, illiteracy, and poverty. Our Livelihood Enhancement Program is designed to empower individuals by providing them with the skills and resources necessary for self-sufficiency.
two_detail: We offer comprehensive vocational training, income-generating schemes, and basic business skills workshops, specifically targeting women, youth, and older individuals. By promoting a strong work ethic and providing sponsorship opportunities, we aim to transform the lives of highly vulnerable children and their families. Through these initiatives, we are committed to fostering economic resilience and improving the overall quality of life in our communities.
